mapper.sql: CODE_CFC_SYS_ID, CODE_CFC_SYS_LNM, CODE_CFC_SYS_PNM, CODE_CFC_SYS_CD, CODE_CFC_SYS_FRM, CRG_USER_ID, RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID
mapper.select:
SELECT A.CODE_CFC_SYS_ID , A.CODE_CFC_SYS_LNM , A.CODE_CFC_SYS_PNM , A.CODE_CFC_SYS_CD , A.CODE_CFC_SYS_FRM , A.CRG_USER_ID , A.RQST_NO , A.RQST_SNO , A.OBJ_DESCN , A.OBJ_VERS , A.REG_TYP_CD , U.USER_NM AS CRG_USER_NM
FROM WAM_CODE_CFC_SYS A LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_USER U ON A.CRG_USER_ID = U.USER_ID AND U.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND U.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') WHERE A.CODE_CFC_SYS_ID = #{codeCfcSysId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U')
mapper.insert: insert into WAM_CODE_CFC_SYS (CODE_CFC_SYS_ID, CODE_CFC_SYS_LNM, CODE_CFC_SYS_PNM, CODE_CFC_SYS_CD, CODE_CFC_SYS_FRM, CRG_USER_ID, RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID) values (#{codeCfcSysId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{codeCfcSysLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{codeCfcSysPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{codeCfcSysCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{codeCfcSysFrm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{crgUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into WAM_CODE_CFC_SYS
CODE_CFC_SYS_ID,
CODE_CFC_SYS_LNM,
CODE_CFC_SYS_PNM,
CODE_CFC_SYS_CD,
CODE_CFC_SYS_FRM,

REG_TYP_CD,
FRS_RQST_DTM,
FRS_RQST_USER_ID,
RQST_DTM,
RQST_USER_ID,
APRV_DTM,
APRV_USER_ID,

mapper.update:
update WAM_CODE_CFC_SYS
CODE_CFC_SYS_LNM = #{codeCfcSysLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CODE_CFC_SYS_PNM = #{codeCfcSysPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CODE_CFC_SYS_CD = #{codeCfcSysCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CODE_CFC_SYS_FRM = #{codeCfcSysFrm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CRG_USER_ID = #{crgUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REG_TYP_CD = #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FRS_RQST_DTM = #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FRS_RQST_USER_ID = #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RQST_DTM = #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
RQST_USER_ID = #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APRV_DTM = #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
APRV_USER_ID = #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where CODE_CFC_SYS_ID = #{codeCfcSysId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update WAM_CODE_CFC_SYS set CODE_CFC_SYS_LNM = #{codeCfcSysLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CODE_CFC_SYS_PNM = #{codeCfcSysPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CODE_CFC_SYS_CD = #{codeCfcSysCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CODE_CFC_SYS_FRM = #{codeCfcSysFrm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CRG_USER_ID = #{crgUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REG_TYP_CD = #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FRS_RQST_DTM = #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FRS_RQST_USER_ID = #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RQST_DTM = #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RQST_USER_ID = #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APRV_DTM = #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, APRV_USER_ID = #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where CODE_CFC_SYS_ID = #{codeCfcSysId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
SELECT A.* , U.USER_NM AS CRG_USER_NM , P.USER_NM AS APRV_USER_NM , R.USER_NM AS RQST_USER_NM FROM WAM_CODE_CFC_SYS A
LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_USER U ON A.CRG_USER_ID = U.USER_ID AND U.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND U.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_USER P ON A.APRV_USER_ID = P.USER_ID AND P.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND P.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_USER R ON A.RQST_USER_ID = R.USER_ID AND R.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND R.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U')
AND A.CODE_CFC_SYS_LNM LIKE '%' || #{codeCfcSysLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
AND A.CODE_CFC_SYS_CD = #{codeCfcSysCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND A.CODE_CFC_SYS_FRM LIKE '%' || #{codeCfcSysFrm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
AND U.USER_NM LIKE '%' || #{crgUserNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'

SELECT A.* , CASE WHEN A.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') THEN '#0000FF' ELSE NULL END AS FontColor FROM WAH_CODE_CFC_SYS A WHERE CODE_CFC_SYS_ID = #{codeCfcSysId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY EXP_DTM DESC, STR_DTM DESC
